message.content:
cs.CR, cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.CC, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the topic of secure sketch, which is a cryptographic primitive used for error-tolerant storage of sensitive information. This falls under the category of cryptography and security (cs.CR). The paper also proposes a concrete construction for secure sketch, which involves coding theory and information theory concepts such as entropy and min-entropy. Therefore, it could also be classified under information theory (cs.IT) and data structures and algorithms (cs.DS). The paper mentions the efficient recovery algorithm, which suggests the involvement of complexity theory (cs.CC). Finally, the paper also discusses the solution to two NP-complete coding problems, which could be classified under machine learning (cs.LG).
